title: Subterranean Pornographer XVII
description: XVII spends his nights playing the synthesizer at The Rose in Winter Pleasure Palace and selling pornographic photos of himself on his breaks. Doing what he must to survive the harsh Underground, the last thing he wants is a relationship. But when lieutenant governor Rowan Arison shows up one evening, he can’t seem to get rid of him. As the two become closer, class differences, along with a resurfacing of past trauma, begins to threaten their budding relationship. Rowan is immediately enamored with the bold and mysterious XVII. But despite his plans to use him for his new campaign, XVII seems to have other ideas. The wealthy politician ends up agreeing to take part in XVII’s pornography business and possibly something much deeper. XVII has dangerous plans, and is willing to do anything to fight for the rights of the Underground. How far will Rowan go to keep XVII safely by his side? Together they must decide if their relationship can endure the trials of sex, love, and insurgency.Subterranean Pornographer XVII is a 35k word MM dystopian romance. It can be read as a standalone, but is best read following Lap Dance! For Dystopia.CW: This novella contains dark themes but low relationship angst. There are mentions of past child abuse and child sexual exploitation (no graphic descriptions).
author: Lysander Arden
